# iosxr_vrf (Data Source)

This data source can read the VRF configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iosxr_vrf" "example" {
  vrf_name = "VRF4"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `vrf_name` (String) VRF name

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) A description for the VRF
- `evpn_route_sync` (Number) Configure the EVPN Instance VPN ID for route synchronization
- `fallback_vrf` (String) Fallback vrf for this VRF
- `id` (String) The path of the retrieved object.
- `ipv4_flowspec` (Boolean) Flowspec sub address family
- `ipv4_multicast` (Boolean) Multicast topology
- `ipv4_multicast_export_route_policy` (String) Use route-policy for export
- `ipv4_multicast_export_route_target_four_byte_as_format` (Attributes List) 4-byte AS number (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--ipv4_multicast_export_route_target_four_byte_as_format))
- `ipv4_multicast_export_route_target_ip_address_format` (Attributes List) ipv4 address route target (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--ipv4_multicast_export_route_target_ip_address_format))
- `ipv4_multicast_export_route_target_two_byte_as_format` (Attributes List) 2-byte AS number (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--ipv4_multicast_export_route_target_two_byte_as_format))
- `ipv4_multicast_export_to_default_vrf_allow_imported_vpn` (Boolean) Export imported VPN routes to default VRF
- `ipv4_multicast_export_to_default_vrf_route_policy` (String) Use route-policy for export
- `ipv4_multicast_export_to_vrf_allow_backup` (Boolean) Allow Export of backup path
- `ipv4_multicast_export_to_vrf_allow_best_external` (Boolean) Allow Export of best-external path
- `ipv4_multicast_export_to_vrf_allow_imported_vpn` (Boolean) Allow export of imported VPN routes to non-default VRF
- `ipv4_multicast_import_from_bridge_domain_advertise_as_vpn` (Boolean) Advertise local EVPN imported routes to PEs
- `ipv4_multicast_import_from_default_vrf_advertise_as_vpn` (Boolean) Advertise imported routes to PEs

- `ipv4_multicast_import_from_vrf_advertise_as_vpn` (Boolean) Advertise imported routes to PEs
